channel.title: Singletrack Sessions (Fast Test)
channel.description: Mountain biking talk: trails, technique, gear, and the people who build the ride. Fast test version with minimal episode.
channel.itunes:author: Maya Koster

item.title: Episode 1: Building Trails That Last (Fast Test)
item.description: Maya talks with trail builder Liam Verbeek about drainage, line choice, and keeping trails rideable through winter. Fast test version.
